20101229163834.000|20101229163836.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SOMEHOW BETWEEN    
20101229163836.000|20101229163839.000|CC1|HAIR LOSS, A DOUBLE MASTECTOMY  
20101229163839.000|20101229163841.000|CC1|AND ENDLESS HOSPITAL VISITS, A  
20101229163841.000|20101229163842.000|CC1|ARE STILL FOUND A WAY TO LAUGH  
20101229163842.000|20101229163844.000|CC1|AND THAT GAVE HER STRENGTH.     
20101229163844.000|20101229163845.000|CC1|SHE WANTED TO PASS THE FEELING  
20101229163845.000|20101229163846.000|CC1|ON TO OTHER WOMEN WHO SUFFERED  
20101229163846.000|20101229163849.000|CC1|FROM THE DISEASE.

20101229163938.000|20101229163939.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SARAH PASSED AWAY

20101229163941.000|20101229163943.000|CC1|ONE OF SARAH'S BIGGEST WISHES IN
20101229163943.000|20101229163945.000|CC1|LIFE WAS TO HAVE GRANDCHILDREN.
